body.name: LALASTAR Countertop Compost Bin with Lid, Hanging Small Trash Can with Lid Under Sink for Kitchen, Food Waste Bin for Countertop, Mountable Garbage Can for Bathroom, RV, 5L/1.3 Gal, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 15 hrs 39 mins
features: 【Odor-Blocking & Fruit Fly Free】Say goodbye to the smelly decomposing waste. Our compost bin countertop comes with a precisely-fit lid, you can let the scraps build up for several days without worrying about attracting fruit flies or terrible smells into your kitchen.

【Multi-purpose】This plastic trash can can be put on the kitchen countertop; mounted on the wall in the kitchen/bathroom/laundry room with adhesive tape; hung over the cabinet doors, pantry doors, cupboard, under sink with over-the-door-hook.
【Convenient】Use this small trash can with lid to store fruit scraps, vegetable peelings and other compostable materials for several days, and save your trips to your outdoor compost piles or bins.
【Compact Size】1.3 Gallons / 5 Liter. 9.6” x 7.5” x 5.7”. The compost container doesn't take up too much countertop space. Perfectly fits on a countertop, under the sink, or in the pantry.

【Dishwasher Safe & BPA Free】The wall mounted trash can is made of high-quality, BPA-free plastic that is stain and odor resistant, easy to wash. The retention ring of the comosting bin helps keep the garbage bags from sliding down.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: VERSATILE SMALL TRASH CAN WITH LID Love gardening? Our compost container is used to store food scraps and other compost materials until they can be transferred to an outdoor composter, compost piles or garden. Specifications: Color: Black Capacity: 5L/1.3Gal Dimensions：9.6×7.5×5.7 Inches Two Installation Ways: Hanging with Hanging HookWall mounted with Adhesive Pad

Wall-mounted Design The food waste caddy can be wall mounted quickly and easily by the powerful self-adhesive tape. Note: Suitable for surface like ceramic tiles, smooth marble, glass, solid wood wall. Hanging Design Over-the-door Hook enables the waste bin hang on the cabinet door or drawer. It can also be used under sink or under counter. Note: The thickness of the door should be less than 2.2cm. Four Different Colors There are four colors of trash can available. Choose whatever you like. Their vivid colors will bright your home. Ideal Size Great for storing leftovers, scraps, and food; transferring scraps to your outside compost pile.

DETAILS Bag Retenion Ring With the help of the bag press ring, you don't need to worry about the plastic bags in the compost bin will slip off. Oder-blocking Lid The precision-fit lid helps keep odors in and fruit flies out. Say goodbye to the smelly decomposing waste. Lid with Small Hook The lid can also hang around the compst bucket. So you don't need to take the lid off constantly when you throw garbage. Easy-to-open Lid The lid is easy to open and close. Both the trash can body and lid are dishwasher safe.

SCENES For Bathroom Suitable for the wall of the bathroom and easy to throw the garbage. For Kitchen Hang on the kitchen wall to throw kitchen towel, food packaging bags, etc. For Office Desktop Mini size saves space. Ideal for office tabletop, bathroom vanity countertop, and more. For Bedroom Drawer Convenient to throw the garbages when you are in bed. Keep your bedroom clean and tidy.

5L Trash Can-Black 7L Trash Can-Black 7L Trash Can-Blue 7L Trash Can-Green 7L Trash Can-Blue 3L Trash Can-Black Capacity 1.3 Gallon 1.8 Gallon 1.8 Gallon 1.8 Gallon 1.8 Gallon 0.8 Gallon Hanging ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Wall-Mount ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE THIS RECYCLING BUCKET!!
reviews.reviewText: This bucket is easy to use and IS SURE TO BE USED (the most important factor!!) due to its ability to be hung just about anywhere that's convenient, thanks to its dual hanging system. I have mine hanging on a drawer adjacent to the most used section of the kitchen counter, so it doesn't take up any counter space (a guarded commodity in my home, due to lack of it). It's a perfect size (will hold all scraps and peelings from a large vegetable soup), has a good size handle that keeps your hands clean when emptying it, it cleans up exceptionally well (no odors absorbed or left behind), it's light weight, the lid controls odor very well (even from onions!), and, something the description doesn't mention, there is a handy removable insert that easily fits on the rim to hold a plastic bag liner in place, if you want to use one. I find this bin cleans up easily and doesn't absorb odors, so I don't use one (wasteful, anyway). I also love the color- a gorgeous green. I am very happy with this recycling bucket!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Clean, Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: I needed a small green waste container to replace one with a hinged lid that broke. For me this is the perfect size for that use and because the lid is a separate piece there is no hinge to fail and no little nooks and crannies around the latch and hinges that can collect waste while being very difficult to clean. So much happier with this simple little container. The collar that holds the bag is simple and effective. This container completely meets my needs in a simple and easy to clean product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice food scrap bucket
reviews.reviewText: Love it. We were just asked by the garbage companies to sort food waste from the garbage. This bucket is perfect. Comes with adhesive & hooks if you want to mount it on the side of a cabinet. I just keep it below my sink and grab it when I need it. It has a rim to place over the bag so it doesn’t slip down and the lid is easy to remove. It’s a perfect size because you really don’t want anything larger and then need to wait until it’s full to remove it …. That may get stinky. Highly recommend, made of durable material and I love the color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works as good Compost box for us
reviews.reviewText: Got the teal blue version. 1.3 G size. It hangs inside our cabinet door under the sink from top edge of door. The door doesn't quite close with the hanger in place, but I am okay with that -- our kitchen is not super fancy. This replaces an aluminum flour bin that we kept on the counter. The first bin rusted out. This gives us room on the counter. We have had no issues with smell. We maybe go up to 5 days or so between emptying the bin. The cover is not air tight by any stretch, but it closes well enough, and in conjunction with being under the counter, behind the door, keeps the smells at bay. It has a handle which makes taking it out to the compost bucket much nicer. The handle doesn't feel like the most sturdy thing, but so far after 4-5 months, no issues. There is a ring on the top edge that you can use to keep a small bag in place. We dont use that feature, and the ring adds an extra step to cleaning, but it is is minor inconvenience. For what we were looking for and how we use it, it's a solid 4.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product.....well designed.
reviews.reviewText: Best product I have bought from Amazon. It does the job and is very functional. I've always hated putting food waste such as peelings, coffee grinds, etc in my large 13 gal kitchen garbage bag....it would end up attracting bugs and smell of garbage by the time it was full and needed to be emptied. This product solves the problem. It is small and compact...easy to use. Lid stops bugs and odors. Well made. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Roomy, keeps the cat out
reviews.reviewText: I previously had an OXO compost bin that I liked, but my cat figured out how to nudge the lid up and eat dangerous snacks from it. So I got this one, which requires human fingers to lift the lid off, and the cat has not gotten in. It's slightly larger than the OXO one too which is nice. It seems less sturdy (plastic is lighter) but it is holding up fine so far. I really like the hook on the lid so you can rest it on the bin when you are actively using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice Little Trash Can and will work great for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the whole container. Bags fit with a bag holder around top rim. Haa a hanger on top to fit over cabinet door. And lid has a hook on back to hang on side of container when in use. Perfect.
